# The `CFGuard.cpp` File Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This file contains the IR transform to add Microsoft&#39;s Control Flow Guard checks on Windows targets. <a href="#details">More...</a>

<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Adds Control Flow Guard (CFG) checks on indirect function calls/invokes.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// These checks ensure that the target address corresponds to the start of an</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// address-taken function. X86&#95;64 targets use the Mechanism::Dispatch</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// mechanism. X86, ARM, and AArch64 targets use the Mechanism::Check machanism.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-cfguard-cpp-/cfguardimpl"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-cfguard-cpp-/cfguardimpl/#a189c4eff521b392f0c9b9887491482e7">CFGuardImpl</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">public</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="42" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-cfguard-cpp-/cfguardimpl/#a0a73b0baf8c99b22b38b1c2898be8e69"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">using </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-cfguard-cpp-/cfguardimpl/#a0a73b0baf8c99b22b38b1c2898be8e69">Mechanism</a> = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/cfguardpass/#ab92e96e8e3579c5aac36c65c19bcc128">CFGuardPass::Mechanism</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-cfguard-cpp-/cfguardimpl/#a189c4eff521b392f0c9b9887491482e7"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-cfguard-cpp-/cfguardimpl/#a189c4eff521b392f0c9b9887491482e7">CFGuardImpl</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-cfguard-cpp-/cfguardimpl/#a0a73b0baf8c99b22b38b1c2898be8e69">Mechanism</a> M) : GuardMechanism(M) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Get or insert the guard check or dispatch global symbols.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">switch</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (GuardMechanism) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Mechanism::Check:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48"><span class="doxyHighlight">      GuardFnName = </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;&#95;&#95;guard&#95;check&#95;icall&#95;fptr&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="53"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="54"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Inserts a Control Flow Guard (CFG) check on an indirect call using the CFG</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// check mechanism. When the image is loaded, the loader puts the appropriate</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// guard check function pointer in the &#95;&#95;guard&#95;check&#95;icall&#95;fptr global</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// symbol. This checks that the target address is a valid address-taken</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// function. The address of the target function is passed to the guard check</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// function in an architecture-specific register (e.g. ECX on 32-bit X86,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// X15 on Aarch64, and R0 on ARM). The guard check function has no return</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// value (if the target is invalid, the guard check funtion will raise an</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// error).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// For example, the following LLVM IR:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\code</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   %func&#95;ptr = alloca i32 ()&#42;, align 8</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   store i32 ()&#42; @target&#95;func, i32 ()&#42;&#42; %func&#95;ptr, align 8</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   %0 = load i32 ()&#42;, i32 ()&#42;&#42; %func&#95;ptr, align 8</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   %1 = call i32 %0()</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\endcode</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// is transformed to:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\code</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   %func&#95;ptr = alloca i32 ()&#42;, align 8</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   store i32 ()&#42; @target&#95;func, i32 ()&#42;&#42; %func&#95;ptr, align 8</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   %0 = load i32 ()&#42;, i32 ()&#42;&#42; %func&#95;ptr, align 8</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   %1 = load void (i8&#42;)&#42;, void (i8&#42;)&#42;&#42; @&#95;&#95;guard&#95;check&#95;icall&#95;fptr</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   %2 = bitcast i32 ()&#42; %0 to i8&#42;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   call cfguard&#95;checkcc void %1(i8&#42; %2)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   %3 = call i32 %0()</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\endcode</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// For example, the following X86 assembly code:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\code</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   movl  $&#95;target&#95;func, %eax</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   calll &#42;%eax</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\endcode</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// is transformed to:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\code</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   movl  $&#95;target&#95;func, %ecx</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   calll &#42;&#95;&#95;&#95;guard&#95;check&#95;icall&#95;fptr</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   calll &#42;%ecx</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\endcode</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param CB indirect call to instrument.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> insertCFGuardCheck(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/callbase">CallBase</a> &#42;CB);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Inserts a Control Flow Guard (CFG) check on an indirect call using the CFG</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// dispatch mechanism. When the image is loaded, the loader puts the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// appropriate guard check function pointer in the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// &#95;&#95;guard&#95;dispatch&#95;icall&#95;fptr global symbol. This checks that the target</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// address is a valid address-taken function and, if so, tail calls the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// target. The target address is passed in an architecture-specific register</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// (e.g. RAX on X86&#95;64), with all other arguments for the target function</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// passed as usual.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// For example, the following LLVM IR:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\code</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   %func&#95;ptr = alloca i32 ()&#42;, align 8</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   store i32 ()&#42; @target&#95;func, i32 ()&#42;&#42; %func&#95;ptr, align 8</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   %0 = load i32 ()&#42;, i32 ()&#42;&#42; %func&#95;ptr, align 8</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   %1 = call i32 %0()</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\endcode</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// is transformed to:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\code</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   %func&#95;ptr = alloca i32 ()&#42;, align 8</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   store i32 ()&#42; @target&#95;func, i32 ()&#42;&#42; %func&#95;ptr, align 8</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   %0 = load i32 ()&#42;, i32 ()&#42;&#42; %func&#95;ptr, align 8</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   %1 = load i32 ()&#42;, i32 ()&#42;&#42; @&#95;&#95;guard&#95;dispatch&#95;icall&#95;fptr</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   %2 = call i32 %1() &#91; &quot;cfguardtarget&quot;(i32 ()&#42; %0) &#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\endcode</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// For example, the following X86&#95;64 assembly code:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\code</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   leaq   target&#95;func(%rip), %rax</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   callq  &#42;%rax</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\endcode</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// is transformed to:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\code</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   leaq   target&#95;func(%rip), %rax</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   callq  &#42;&#95;&#95;guard&#95;dispatch&#95;icall&#95;fptr(%rip)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\endcode</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param CB indirect call to instrument.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> insertCFGuardDispatch(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/callbase">CallBase</a> &#42;CB);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"></CodeLine>
